a.title: From the offices of the school nurses
Link to USCSD School Board information

div.p: The April 27, 2020, meeting of the Board of School Directors will be held virtually due to the school closure and ongoing stay-at-home order in effect in Allegheny County.

a.title: Go to comments for School Board meeting notice

div.p: Every Friday, a Weekly Recap is compiled with all of the latest district news, upcoming events, bulletin board fliers and links to media coverage of the school district.

a.title: Go to comments for Weekly Recap for Friday, April 17, 2020

div.p: Gov. Tom Wolf announced that all Pennsylvania public schools will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 academic year.

a.title: Go to comments for CORONAVIRUS 2019 (COVID-19) UPDATE - April 9

img.alt: Gov. Wolf issues Stay-at-Home Order ALL district facilities/grounds CLOSED

a.span: Gov. Wolf issues Stay-at-Home Order ALL district facilities/grounds CLOSED

div.p: ALL district properties, fields and playgrounds are CLOSED. This includes the high school stadium and track as well as the turf field at Boyce.

a.title: Go to comments for Gov. Wolf issues Stay-at-Home Order ALL district facilities/grounds CLOSED

img.alt: School meals available for curbside pick-up

a.span: School meals available for curbside pick-up

div.p: We recognize that this closure affects families in many ways, including impacting students access to our school meals program. USC is committed to continuing to provide meals for our students throughout this closure.

a.title: Go to comments for School meals available for curbside pick-up

div.p: Kindergarten registration will now occur in two phases online registration followed by kindergarten screening appointments and documentation collection at a later date.

a.title: Go to comments for 2020-21 Kindergarten registration modified

img.alt: Community Day events canceled for May

a.span: Community Day events canceled for May

div.p: Upper St. Clair leaders have made the difficult decision to cancel the event, which was set for Saturday, May 16, 2020.

a.title: Go to comments for Community Day events canceled for May

img.alt: USC parent organizations coordinate assistance for families

a.span: USC parent organizations coordinate assistance for families

div.p: THANK YOU to all of the schools and families who have participated in the USC SCHOOLS CARE FOR USC FAMILIES fundraiser! To date, we have raised over $7,000 for USCSD families in need!

a.title: Go to comments for USC parent organizations coordinate assistance for families

div.p: Planning to volunteer in your childs school and/or classroom? Do you have a 6th grader who will be experiencing Deer Valley with a parent chaperone? Background checks, which are valid for five years, are required for school volunteers.

a.title: Go to comments for Volunteers & Required Clearances

div.p: 1775 McLaughlin Run Road, Upper St. Clair, PA 15241

div.class: gb footer one right white flex fd-c jc-fe

div.span: The Upper St. Clair School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, age, sex, disability or any other legally protected classification in the employment or in the administration of any of its educational programs and activities. Announcement of this policy is in accordance with state and federal laws including Title IV of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, Title IX of the Educational Amendments of 1972, Sections 503 and 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Age Discrimination Act of 1975, the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990, and the Pennsylvania Human Relations Act.

div.class: gb footer two white flex ai-c
